name: SAMA Foundation
briefDescription: It is an enormous pleasure to share a few words of SAMA Foundationâ€™s interventions in addressing the needs of the most marginalised group i.e. people with disability.A Group of young people with disability in 2005 decided to start SAMA Foundation as non profit organisation. One of our Board of Trustee is Deafblind and he has been advocating for  promoting the rights of people with Deafblind. Our team is a having passion and commitment to work towards an inclusive and impartial society where people with disability can enjoy their entitlements by exercising their Rights.  At present we are addressing the Health, Education, Livelihood and Advocacy in 5 backward districts (Dharwad, Gadag, Haveri, Bagalakote, Chitradurga) in North Karnataka, covering 150 villages and in 10 slums of Bangalore North-West. So far we have been able to reach more than 2000 People with disabilities.
